divs: sighting detailsi was at work last night on security patrol for a client in detroit and was in the parking lot at the time of the incident. i was surveying all areas as it is my job to watch for any ususual activity from any direction. all of the sudden a bright, greenish\blueish light captures my eye and appears to be falling toward the earth. as the light is falling it goes parallel with the earth and completely disappears. it almost simulated the motion of a plane that was falling out of the sky that was no longer in control and preparing for impact. i thing the strangest part was that all i could make of it in the three seconds that i saw the object was the color and that it was nothing more than a light. there was no defined shape that i could see. i thought of the possiblility that it wasn't a ufo, but rather something in space that may be extremely common, but i don't believe that it is considering it came from nowhere as well as left in a matter of seconds.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around November 7th 2010
Summary: A large flash of light came from nowhere and appeared to be falling toward the earth and then disappeared again.
